thread.title: If you’re medium skin-toned, here are 13 celebs to look to for instant beauty inspiration
thread.title_full: If you’re medium skin-toned, here are 13 celebs to look to for instant beauty inspiration

author: Zara Hanawalt
title: If you’re medium skin-toned, here are 13 celebs to look to for instant beauty inspiration
text:
If you’re medium skin-toned, here are 13 celebs to look to for instant beauty inspiration I grew up in the ’90s, a time when blonde-haired, blue-eyed beauty was almost the only type I ever saw praised. Trust me when I say that it wasn’t always easy for a girl like me to find relatable beauty icons : I have almost-black hair and deep brown eyes. I also have a medium skin tone, and while you’d think that would be relatively common, the truth is, few stars had similar complexions when I was growing up.
Luckily, that’s changing. Hollywood is packed with stars who have complexions that resemble what so many other ladies have — and for girls like me, that doesn’t just make defining the looks that will work on my own complexion easier, it also gives us a positive lens through which to view our own appearances .
Here are a few of the ladies I love to look up to for beauty inspo.
Jessica Alba Starting today, you can shop items from my closet at @vestiaireco with all proceeds going to @Baby2Baby! PS this dress is one of the items in the sale... 
A photo posted by Jessica Alba (@jessicaalba) on Nov 15, 2016 at 8:56am PST 
Glowing skin, minimal makeup, and defined lashes compose Jessica’s signature look.
Victoria Justice #tbt to when I did the mannequin challenge... 
A photo posted by Victoria Justice (@victoriajustice) on Jan 12, 2017 at 10:15am PST 
The stunning star serves up effortless girl-next-door swag like no other.
Kourtney Kardashian Styling Diary: Getting ready for my mom's Christmas Eve party. On my app. 
A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Jan 6, 2017 at 12:42pm PST 
All the Kardashian sisters are beauty geniuses, but Kourt favors bold colors that really make her medium skin tone pop.
Priyanka Chopra I took a pill in Ibiza... #purplehaze #falldaze 
A photo posted by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Nov 11, 2016 at 9:57am PST 
Aside from having some of the best hair in the game, Priyanka is also one of those stars who always matches her beauty look to her outfit flawlessly.
Shay Mitchell When it finally stops raining... 
A photo posted by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Jan 11, 2017 at 9:42pm PST 
She’s such a chameleon where beauty is concerned, and we love that she never shies away from trying new things.
Meghan Markle Weekend shenanigans with @jessicamulroney (wearing my very favorite button down from @mishanonoo) 
A photo posted by Meghan Markle (@meghanmarkle) on Oct 1, 2016 at 11:52am PDT 
The up-and-comer has SUCH beautiful skin.

Vanessa Hudgens ♡ 
A photo posted by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Jan 22, 2017 at 10:16pm PST 
Boho chicks will love looking up to this eclectic star.
Camilla Cabello Truly. Madly. Deeply. 
A photo posted by Camila Cabello (@camila_cabello) on Dec 27, 2016 at 5:28pm PST 
The long hair, smoky eye, and neutral lip look is Camilla’s thing, and she does it so well.
Jennifer Lopez I love the first day of a new production!! Its the beginning of a new adventure!! I feel so lucky to be here with @neyo @derekhough @jennaldewan So exciting!!!! @nbcworldofdance Here we go!! #dance #amillionreasonstowatch #nbc #worldofdance #comingthisspring 
A photo posted by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Jan 16, 2017 at 3:57pm PST 
I mean, duh.
Adriana Lima A photo posted by Adriana Lima (@adrianalima) on Jan 15, 2017 at 5:06pm PST 
The Victoria’s Secret’s beauty goes makeup-free frequently, which is seriously awesome to see.
Hannah Simone Still can't believe I had the chance to channel my inner Audrey Hepburn... if she was an Indian Italian German Cypriot nomadic gypsy mutt cat sneaking into parties. 
A photo posted by Hannah Simone (@therealhannahsimone) on Jan 12, 2017 at 10:18am PST 
Nobody rocks that precise winged liner quite as well.
Chrissy Teigen Don’t tell John! #RexyTheCoachDino @coach 
A photo posted by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Nov 5, 2016 at 6:46pm PDT 
Follow her for the hilarious commentary, stay for the killer beauty inspo.
Lea Michele I’m so excited to join @aerie’s REAL talk tomorrow at their new SoHo pop-up! We’ll be talking about all things #AerieREAL: women’s empowerment, body positivity and so much more! Get inspired with me and watch a live stream of the event on Aerie’s Facebook page starting tomorrow at 11:15AM EST #ad 
A photo posted by Lea Michele (@leamichele) on Dec 14, 2016 at 2:58pm PST 
She always slays ’70s-inspired glam, doesn’t she?
